subScenes.name: 晨会进度汇报
subScenes.description: 同事在晨会上简要汇报项目进展

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, how's the client report coming along?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，客户报告进展怎么样了？

responses.text: I'm about 80% done—should finish by lunch.
responses.text_cn: 我快完成了，80%，午饭前能搞定。

responses.text: Almost there! Just polishing the final slides.
responses.text_cn: 快好了，正在润色最后几页幻灯片。

responses.text: Good, thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体进度回应，避免只说'还行'

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you send me the draft by noon?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你中午前能把初稿发我吗？

responses.text: Sure thing—I'll email it by 11:30.
I can, but I need your feedback on section 3 first.
responses.text_cn: 可以，但我先得你对第三部分的反馈。

responses.text: I'll try.

qaPairs.usageNote: 承诺时间时要具体，别只说'我会努力'

subScenes.name: 求助资源协调
subScenes.description: 向同事请求协助或资源支持

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, I'm swamped with the QA phase—can you help me review the test cases?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我QA阶段忙疯了，能帮我审一下测试用例吗？

responses.text: Yeah, I can jump in after my 2pm meeting.
responses.text_cn: 能，我两点后会议结束就帮你。

responses.text: I'd love to, but I'm tied up till Friday.
responses.text_cn: 我想帮，但我周五前都抽不开身。

responses.text: Sure, send me the file.

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达帮助意愿时，说明时间范围更专业

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you have access to the new analytics tool?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你有新数据分析工具的权限吗？

responses.text: Yeah, I got access last week—I can share the login.
responses.text_cn: 有，我上周就开通了，可以发你账号。

responses.text: Not yet—I'll ping IT today.
I think so.

qaPairs.usageNote: 不确定时别含糊，主动说明下一步行动

subScenes.name: 任务优先级确认
subScenes.description: 与主管确认任务优先级以避免冲突

qaPairs.speakerText: I've got two deadlines this week—can we prioritize which one to tackle first?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我这周有两个截止日，能帮我定下哪个先做吗？

responses.text: Definitely do the client deliverable first—it's due Thursday.
responses.text_cn: 先做客户交付物，周四截止。

responses.text: Hmm, let's push the internal one to next week.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，把内部的推到下周吧。

responses.text: Both are urgent.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出选项，让主管做选择而非直接问怎么办

qaPairs.speakerText: If I focus on the report, can you handle the team sync?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果我专注写报告，你能负责团队同步会吗？

responses.text: Absolutely—I'll book the room and send the agenda.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我来订会议室和发议程。

responses.text: I'm not sure I can—I've got my own deadline.
responses.text_cn: 我不确定，我自己也有截止日。

responses.text: Okay, thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出替代方案时，主动承担后续动作

subScenes.name: 项目收尾致谢
subScenes.description: 项目完成后表达感谢与团队认可

qaPairs.speakerText: We crushed that project—thanks everyone for pulling through!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 咱们把项目搞定了！感谢大家的全力付出！

responses.text: No problem! Happy we nailed it.
Thanks for leading us so well—you made it easy.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢你带得好，让我们轻松不少。

responses.text: Yeah, good job.

qaPairs.usageNote: 感谢时具体点出对方贡献，更显真诚

qaPairs.speakerText: Let’s celebrate with coffee next week?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 下周一起喝杯咖啡庆祝一下？

responses.text: Love that idea—I’ll pick the spot!
Sounds good, I'm in.
Maybe next month.

qaPairs.usageNote: 积极回应庆祝提议，增强团队氛围
